availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nicholas Miller (Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer and teamster.)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer and teamster. Ohio native. Married to Lucinda Miller. Father of Saunders Miller, Lucinda Miller, and Nicholas Miller. Farm laborer in Bracken County, Kentucky, in 1860. Teamster in Bracken County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 242.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Bracken County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 164.
